alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 03 at 8:07PM CDT until June 06 at 4:49AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Neosho River near Commerce affecting Ottawa County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neosho River near Commerce. * WHEN...Until early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, moderate agricultural flooding occurs. Riverview Park experiences moderate flooding. State Highway 125 near the fairgrounds will be closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest now and will remain near 19.7 feet until just after midnight tonight. It will then start slowly falling, and will fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
